REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0547 reute d f BC-HEINEKEN-N.V.-<HEIN.A 03-06 0071

TEXT.TITLE: HEINEKEN N.V. <HEIN.AS> 1986 YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Pre-tax profit 513.2 mln guilders vs 545.5 mln Net profit 285.3 mln guilders vs 265.4 mln Consolidated net turnover 6.68 billion guilders vs 6.40 billion Net profit per 25.00 guilder nominal share 11.11 guilders vs 10.33, taking into account one-for-three scrip issue last year Final dividend two guilders vs same, making total 3.50 guilders vs same REUTER
